title: Consider Audience Feedback
text: Gathering feedback from a small audience can provide valuable insights into the presentation's effectiveness.

title: Pilot Presentation
text: Conducting a pilot presentation allows for testing the content and delivery in a real-world setting.

title: Avoid Sole Reliance on Personal Judgment
text: Relying solely on personal judgment may not provide an objective assessment of the presentation's impact.

title: Complex Graphics
text: Using complex graphics might distract rather than enhance the audience's understanding.

title: Importance of Feedback
text: Ignoring audience feedback can lead to missed opportunities for improvement.
